title: CarGo
description: A modern car rental web application that allows users to browse, compare, and book rental cars online. Features include real-time availability, easy booking management, and a user-friendly interface.

title: AMH E-Commerce
description:
I built AMH, a modern full-stack e-commerce platform for a clothing store as a hands-on learning project to strengthen my backend and full-stack development skills.

The application is developed using Java 17, Spring Boot 3.2.0, Spring Security, MySQL, and Thymeleaf, following clean code principles and a layered architecture.

Key features include secure user authentication with BCrypt, role-based access control, a dynamic product catalog with filtering, shopping cart functionality, order tracking, and a powerful admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and users. The UI is fully mobile-responsive, focusing on usability and performance.

This project helped me gain practical experience in Spring Security, database design, RESTful development, and building real-world web applications end-to-end.

Tech Stack:
Java 17 | Spring Boot | Spring Security | MySQL | Thymeleaf | HTML | CSS | JavaScript.

title: Smart Fitness Calorie Burn Predictor
description: I built a Machine Learning web application that predicts calorie burn during workouts!.This project was created for learning purposes and helped me explore:✅ Training ML models (Random Forest)✅ Flask web development ✅ Data visualization with Chart.js ✅ Modern UI/UX design ✅ REST API developmentThe app has two modes:🔹 Predict Mode - Real-time calorie predictions🔹 Analyst Mode - Interactive dashboard with charts & statistics #MachineLearning #Python #Flask #DataScience #WebDevelopment #LearningJourney
